Mino Horns are WIND instruments!

Garet wynn

-----Original Message-----
From: Mott, Mike J. <MIKE.J.MOTT@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 10:48 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Minotaur Horn


>From: "Mott, Mike J." <MIKE.J.MOTT@...>
>
>I now have a Minotaur horn which one of my friends gave me. Does anyone
>know what this is for? It says it is a bard-only item, no stats except 0.1
>weight. I am not sure if it acts like an instrument or not, as I dont have
>a song yet to possibly use this with.
>
>I suspect it is a quest item......
>
>
>Lago the Battle Bard of Bertox
